entry.title: Monitor Gerrit server error_log size
entry.content: Script1234567891011# Checkout error_log sizefile="/home/gerrit2/gerrit-2.14.7/logs/error_log"maxsize=1000 # 1000 kilobytesactualsize=$(du -k "$file" | cut -f1)if [ $actualsize -ge $maxsize ]; then echo size is over $maxsize kilobytes echo "Gerrit error_log size is over $maxsize kilobytes" | mutt -s "Gerrit error_log size warning!" -c baternest@gmail.com exitelse echo size is under $maxsize kilobytesfi Install package12sudo apt-get install msmtpsudo apt-get install mutt Configuration1vi /etc/msmtprc 1234567vi ~/.muttrcset sendmail="/usr/bin/msmtp"set use_from=yesset realname="gerrit2@server.vm"set from=gerrit2@server.vmset envelope_from=yes

entry.title: Cpp explicit
entry.content: C++ keyword ‘explicit’Conversions can either be explicit—when the programmer calls for one type to be converted to another, as in a cast or direct initialization—or implicit—when the language or program calls for a different type than the one given by the programmer. MSDN: The explicit keyword and problems with implicit conversion Wikibooks, open books for an open world: More C++ Idioms/Safe bool cppreference.com: explicit 指定符

entry.title: Environment Setup
entry.content: Setup environment for write down note (Windows)Prerequisite Install Git for Windows (Git Bash) Install Node.js (not necessary, but recommended) Install Visual Studio Code as markdown editor Install hexo (if node.js installed)1npm install hexo-cli -g Clone GitHub repository and checkout source branch123git clone git@github.com:Baternest/baternest.github.io.git -b source --recursivecd baternest.github.io.gitnpm install hexo --save Set author info12git config user.name "Luo ZhengHong"git config user.email "baternest@gmail.com" Create a new post1hexo new "My New Post" or create markdown file into source/_post folder Just commit and push to GitHub123git addgit commitgit push Travis-CI wll auto generate and deploy to https://baternest.github.io
